item.title: 周三，在西部片《锈迹斑斑》（Rust）片场排练期间，演员亚历克-鲍德温（Alec Baldwin）枪杀了一名摄影师，陪审团判定一名电影武器监督犯有过失杀人罪。
item.description:
A jury convicted a movie weapons supervisor of involuntary manslaughter on Wednesday in the fatal shooting of a cinematographer by actor Alec Baldwin during a rehearsal on the set of the Western movie “Rust.” pic.twitter.com/ohDdtswnBC

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 海地总理阿里埃勒-亨利（Ariel Henry）正在努力保住权力，因为他正试图返回家乡。最近几天，海地的帮派袭击导致该国的主要国际机场关闭，并释放了 4000 多名囚犯。
item.description:
Haitian Prime Minister Ariel Henry is struggling to stay in power as he tries to return home, where gang attacks have shuttered the country’s main international airport and freed more than 4,000 inmates in recent days. pic.twitter.com/lVOUTABEfo

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 奥斯卡组织者铺开红地毯，为周日的颁奖典礼做准备。杜比剧院外的红地毯继去年的 "香槟色 "之后，今年又恢复了传统的红色。
item.description:
Oscars organizers roll out the red carpet in preparation for Sunday's ceremony. The carpet outside the Dolby Theatre is back to a traditional red this year after last year's "champagne" color. pic.twitter.com/jIWzAKGkZv
